name: The Mocking Mimic
description:
Overview

This game was created during the Brackeys Game Jam in February 2022. The theme was: It is not real. 

You have been kidnapped by the evil Mimic! He threw you in his dungeon, but you are able to walk, so walk out of here! But be careful: the Mimic has a weird sense of humour and diguised his minions as random objects. Play his sick game mix of Prop Hunt and Escape Room to save yourself! 

The Mimic has hidden all the objects you need in order to escape. Find all 3 parts of the Teleportation Crystal and get the hell out of there!

How to play

The player controls the avatar. The goal is to find all 3 Crystal Parts. They are disguised as other objects in the Levels. The player is given clues about their disguise. Solve the riddle and get the crystals.

We recommend playing the game in fullscreen mode.

Controls 

Up >> W/Arrow Up

Down >> S/Arrow Down

Left >> A/Arrow Left

Interact >> E

Pause >> Space
